question_text: Two heavy spheres of masses 10^4 kg and 10^6 kg and radii 10 m and 20 m respectively are separated by a distance of 100 m. What will be the potential at the mid-point of the line joining their centers?

options.Option 4: Inversely proportional to distance from center

options.Option 1: wavelength is halved and frequency remains unchanged
options.Option 2: wavelength is doubled and frequency becomes half
options.Option 3: wavelength is doubled and frequency remains unchanged
options.Option 4: wavelength and frequency both remain unchanged
